name: Windsor Brokers
tag_list: forex, foreign-exchange, fx, investment-firm, finance, money, currency-exchange, commodities
overview:
Windsor Brokers Limited is a regulated and licensed European Investment Firm offering a rich portfolio of over 70 financial instruments.

With over 100 highly qualified and experienced staff and a growing client base stretching to all seven continents, Windsor holds the key to provide a first class financial service to all type of investors.
